Name: Time Warp
Story Background: The planeswalker, Jace Beleren, discovered a powerful spell that could manipulate time itself. He used it to escape a dangerous situation, but the spell had unintended consequences.
Ability: Take an extra turn after this one.
Appearance Description: The artwork depicts a swirling vortex of blue and white energy, with Jace Beleren standing in the center, looking determined. The edges of the card are frayed, as if time itself is unraveling.
